nodes.text: Behn-Kihl-Nahm was a male senator who served in the Senate of the New Republic during the Black Fleet Crisis.

In 16 ABY, Behn-Kihl-Nahm served as the Chair of the Senate as well as the chair of the Defense Council. As a close political ally and personal friend of Leia Organa Solo, who nicknamed him "Bennie", Behn-kihl-nahm worked hard to deflect the political attacks aimed at Organa Solo following Nil Spaar's departure from Coruscant.
